    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Summernote

    public class SummernoteBase
extends org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui.html.Div
implements HasAllSummernoteHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasEnabled
    Wrapper for the Summernote WYSIWYG Editor

    See: http://summernote.org/

    Author:
    Xiaodong Sun

      • setToolbar

        public void setToolbar(Toolbar toolbar)
        Customizes the toolbar.

        Example: 
         summernote.setToolbar(new Toolbar()
     .addGroup(ToolbarButton.OL, ToolbarButton.BOLD)
     .addGroup(ToolbarButton.HELP));
        Parameters:

      • setFontNamesIgnoreCheck

        public void setFontNamesIgnoreCheck(SummernoteFontName... fontNames)
        Set a list for Web fonts to be ignored.

        Summernote tests font in fontNames before adding them to drop-down. This is problem while using Web fonts. Itâ€™s not easy picking up nice time to check availabilities of Web fonts.
        Parameters:
        fontNames -

      • setAirMode

        public void setAirMode(boolean airMode)
        Set the air mode of the editor. Air-mode gives clearer interface with hidden toolbar. To reveal toolbar, select a text where you want to shape up.

        Defaults to false.
        Parameters:
        airMode - if true, the air mode is turn on

      • setShortcuts

        public void setShortcuts(boolean shortcuts)
        Set false to disable custom shortcuts.

        Defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        shortcuts - if false, disable custom shortcuts

      • setDialogsInBody

        public void setDialogsInBody(boolean dialogsInBody)
        Set true to place dialogs in <body> rather than in the editor.

        Defaults to false.
        Parameters:
        dialogsInBody - if true, place dialogs in <body>

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if the content is empty.

        Editing area needs <p><br></p> for focus, even if contents is empty. So summernote supports this method for helping to check contents is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the editor is empty

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all contents and restores the editable instance to an _emptyPara_: <p><br></p>
